devices.noDevices: No contraptions tied to yer coffers, eh?
devices.subheader: Manage the contraptions allowed access to yer Drop booty.
devices.title: Contraptions

notifications.desc: View and manage yer messages from the crows' nest.
notifications.title: Messages from the Crows' Nest

callback.authorizedClient: Drop has granted passage to the scallywag. Ye may now shut this porthole.
callback.paste: Scribble this code into the scallywag to carry on:
callback.permWarning: Grantin' this request allows "{name}" on "{platform}" to:
callback.requestedAccess: "{name}" has requested passage to yer Drop coffer.

register.confirmPasswordFormat: Must be the same as above, savvy?
register.emailFormat: Must be in the fashion of a true scallywag {'@'} example.com
register.passwordFormat: Must be 14 or more marks, ye landlubber!
register.subheader: Fill in yer details below to make yer mark.
register.title: Forge yer Drop Mark
register.usernameFormat: Must be 5 or more marks, and all lowercase, argh!

signin.externalProvider: Sign in with another ship's captain {arrow}
signin.noAccount: No mark in the logbook? Beg a cap'n to make ye one, argh!
signin.pageTitle: Sign in to Drop, ye dog!
signin.title: Sign in to yer mark

common.cannotUndo: This deed cannot be undone, ye hear!
common.deleteConfirm: Are ye sure ye want to scuttle "{0}", ye rogue?

drop.desc: An open-source game distribution platform built for speed, flexibility and beauty, like a swift brigantine!

errors.inviteRequired: Invitation demanded to sign up, ye landlubber.

add.desc: Drop couldn't add this game to yer treasure hoard: {0}
add.title: Failed to add game to yer treasure hoard

create.desc: Drop couldn't forge yer collection, argh: {0}
create.title: Failed to forge collection

delete.title: Failed to scuttle treasure hoard source

errors.occurred: An error occurred whilst answerin' yer plea. If ye believe this be a bug, report it, ye dog! Try signin' in and see if it clears the decks.

delete.desc: Drop met a squall whilst scuttlin' the version: {error}
delete.title: There was a squall whilst scuttlin' the version

order.desc: Drop met a squall whilst updatin' the version: {error}
order.title: There was a squall whilst updatin' the version order

metadata.title: Failed to update yer charts
metadata.description: Drop failed to update the game's charts: {0}

description.title: Failed to update game description
description.description: Drop failed to update the game description: {0}

banner.title: Failed to hoist the banner image
banner.description: Drop failed to hoist the banner image: {0}

cover.title: Failed to hoist the cover image
cover.description: Drop failed to hoist the cover image: {0}

deleteImage.title: Failed to scuttle the image
deleteImage.description: Drop failed to scuttle the image: {0}

carousel.title: Failed to update image carousel
carousel.description: Drop failed to update the image carousel: {0}

admin.description: Manage the crew on yer Drop vessel, and set yer passage methods, savvy?

authentication.title: Passage
authentication.description: Drop backs many 'passage ways'. As ye enable or disable 'em, they show on the sign-in screen for the crew to pick. Click the dot menu to rig the passage way.

simple.title: Simple passage
simple.description: Simple passage uses a system of 'invitations' to create crew. Ye can forge an invitation, and optionally name a crew name or salty mail for the crew, then it'll make a magic scroll that can be used to make a mark.
simple.inviteDescription: Drop will make a scroll ye can send to the scallywag ye want to invite. Ye can optionally name a crew name or salty mail for them to use.
simple.inviteEmailDescription: Must be in the fashion of a scallywag {'@'} example.com
simple.inviteAdminSwitchDescription: Make this crewman a cap'n, argh!

admin.detectedGame: Drop has found new plunder to import, argh!
admin.detectedVersion: Drop has found new versions of this plunder to import, savvy!

version.launchDesc: Executable to launch the game, matey!
version.noAdv: No advanced options for this rig, argh.
version.setupDesc: Ran once when the game is installed, ye hear!
version.setupModeDesc: When enabled, this version has no launch command, and merely runs the executable on the crew's computer. Useful for games that only give installers and not portable files, argh!
version.umuOverrideDesc: By default, Drop uses a non-ID when launchin' with UMU Launcher. To get the right patches for some games, ye might have to set this field by hand, savvy.
version.updateModeDesc: When enabled, these files will be installed atop (overwritin') the previous version's. If many 'update modes' be chained together, they be applied in order, ye hear!

version.noVersions: Ye have no versions of this plunder available, ye dog!

game.imageCarouselDescription: Customize what images and what order be shown on the store page, savvy.
game.imageCarouselEmpty: No images added to the carousel yet, argh.
game.addCarouselNoImages: No images to add, ye dog.
game.imageLibraryDescription: Please note all images hoisted be accessible to all crew through browser dev-tools, savvy.

sources.createDesc: Drop will use this source to get to yer game treasure hoard, and make 'em available, argh.
sources.desc: Rig yer treasure hoard sources, where Drop will look for new plunder and versions to import, savvy.
sources.fsDesc: Imports games from a path on disk. Needs version-based folder structure, and backs archived games, ye hear!
sources.fsPathDesc: An absolute path to yer game treasure hoard.
sources.nameDesc: The name of yer source, for yer own reckonin', argh.
sources.typeDesc: The type of yer source. Changes the demanded options, ye dog!

admin.subheader: As ye add folders to yer treasure hoard sources, Drop will find 'em and ask ye to import 'em. Each game needs to be imported before ye can import a version, savvy.
admin.title: Treasure Hoards

collection.createDesc: Collections can be used to sort yer plunder and find 'em easier, especially if ye have a grand treasure hoard, argh!
collection.subheader: Add a new collection to sort yer plunder
collection.title: Collection

library.noGames: No plunder in treasure hoard, savvy!
library.subheader: Sort yer plunder into collections for easy access, and get to all yer plunder, savvy!

scheduled.cleanupInvitationsDescription: Cleans up expired invitations from the logbook to save space, savvy.
scheduled.cleanupObjectsDescription: Finds and scuttles unreferenced and unused objects to save space, argh.
scheduled.cleanupSessionsDescription: Cleans up expired sessions to save space and keep ye safe, ye dog!
scheduled.checkUpdateDescription: Check if Drop has new charts.

article.editorGuide: Use the quick ways above or scribble Markdown directly. Backs **bold**, *italic*, [links](url), and more, argh!

news.checkLater: Check back later for new charts, matey!
news.subheader: Stay up to date with the latest charts and announcements, savvy!
news.title: Latest News from the High Seas

store.lookAt: Look at it, ye scurvy dog!
store.readMore: Click to read more, ye dog!
store.title: Store
